Text: Thanks for the 720p version! That's worth seeding a long time.
It's a RAR. What is the video format? Audio format? Thanks!
Lovin' the 720p versions. don't mind the size at all. Those of u who r compaining about rars, simply don't know how 2 use them. Great job TvTeam.

The file is an .mkv, is that what you meant?  Or did you want to know the encoding formats?  The video is in MPEG-4 and the audio is Dolby AC3.

People who post in .rars should say what the file type is, so that others can account for it.  No one was complaining about .rars.
